item.text: Never have I ever spit from the top of a bridge
Never have I ever piss on the beach/sea
Never have I ever skipped class just because it was raining
Never have I ever gone into the wrong gender's bathroom by accident
Never have I ever wanted to marry a goat
Never have I ever stolen
Never have I ever stick it inside a bottle
Never have I ever tried anal
Never have I ever masturbated in public
Never have I ever lied for money
Never have I ever puked while drunk
Never have I ever had a pet
Never have I ever made out with a friend
Never have I ever lit a flare
Never have I ever smoked
Never have I ever beat any of the present players up
Never have I ever drunk a beer in one go
Never have I ever went outside without underwear
Never have I ever been afraid of spiders
Never have I ever cried in the classroom
Never have I ever stuck a gum under a table
Never have I ever made out with any of the other players
Never have I ever had a crush on one of the other players
Never have I ever walked with my pants down
Never have I ever wore someone else's clothes
Never have I ever brushed my teeth without toothpaste
Never have I ever made a number 2 in the forest
Never have I ever failed a test
Never have I ever been with more than three people in one night
Never have I ever had a wet dream with someone who doesn't turn me on in real life
Never have I ever flirted with someone else while having a boyfriend/girlfriend
Never have I ever arrived home drunk and fell asleep in the bathtub
Never have I ever stuck a finger up my butthole
Never have I ever had a look at someone and fantasized
Never have I ever puked on the street
Never have I ever had sex with a minor while i was over 18
